name: Dream Child
description:
☆  ✶ ☆  ✶ ☆

Follow the adventures of a young girl named Terri , as you help her navigate through her different dreams. Making your way through each dream to reach the end of the night, you will face all sorts of challenges and trials standing in your way.  What mysteries await you as you travel deep into the subconscious mind?

☆  ✶  ☆  ✶  ☆

Team:

Cheyenne McGroarty - Project Manager, Environmental Artist, Texture Artist, Art Lead

Jazlyn Dukes - Character Modeler, Animator

Jonathan Platon - 2D Artist, Concept Artist, 3D Modeler, Sound Designer

Michael Bass - Level Designer

Allyson Pyle - Level Designer, Concept Artist

Tonnie Havonec - Programmer Lead

Duc Dang - Programmer
